data.name: My Sticker Book
data.detailed_description:
This is the first day the little girl sleeps on her own.
She wakes up when it is still dark and wants some water.
"But what if there are monsters hiding everywhere in the house?" She wonders.

-About this game-
*This game contains a little bit of horror contents and jump scares.

It only takes roughly 10min to play. (There is no save function)

Mouse: drag stickers
a/d: move
space: jump
Alt+F4: close game
data.about_the_game:

She wakes up when it is still dark and wants some water.

-About this game-

space: jump

data.short_description: "I can't sleep." A cute and possibly a little bit scary puzzle platformer game. Move stickers to the right positions in order to get rid of the monsters and complete the sticker book.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
